main event: A witness observed a large, brightly lit, almost circular object resembling a disc or saucer in Medway, Ohio on February 4, 1968.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be around 100 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted approximately 60 seconds before the object disappeared behind trees., The object was nearly stationary and moving silently at a low altitude of about 300 feet., It emitted a slight humming sound and appeared to move erratically before vanishing., There was no physical evidence or photographs documented in the report.
sighted object: a large, brightly lit disc-shaped object
witness description: The witness is a retired individual from Medway, Ohio.
